Name: IfNotNull<T, TResult>
Description: if the object this method is called on is not null, runs the given function and returns the value. if the object is null, returns default(TResult).
Author: dave thieben
Entries: var username = HttpContext.Current.IfNotNull( ctx => ctx.User.IfNotNull( user => user.Identity.IfNotNull( iden => iden.Name ) ) );
